com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.framework

Class AbstractOI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.utils.CodeThread
      • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.framework.AbstractOI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class AbstractOI
extends CodeThread
    A class that handles spawning commands based off of button inputs.

    • Method Detail

      • whenPressed

        public void whenPressed(Button b,
                        Command c)
        Makes a command run when a button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.

      • whenReleased

        public void whenReleased(Button b,
                         Command c)
        Makes a command run when a button is released.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.

      • whileHeld

        public void whileHeld(Button b,
                      Command c)
        Makes a command run while a button is held. If the command terminates and the button is still held, the command will start again.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.

      • runCommand

        public static void runCommand(Command c)
        Adds a command to the trigger list and runs it. This is used for when you just want to run a command somewhere in the code without worrying about keeping the command object around.
        Parameters:
        c - The command to be run.

      • runCommands

        public static void runCommands(Command... cs)
        Adds multiple commands to the trigger list and runs them. This is used for when you just want to run commands somewhere in the code without worrying about keeping their objects around.
        Parameters:
        cs - The commands to be run.

      • deleteAllTriggers

        public static void deleteAllTriggers()
        Deletes all the Command triggers and stops any Commands they may have started.

      • addNetButton

        public static void addNetButton(NetButton b)
        Adds a NetButton to the update list.
        Parameters:
        b - The NetButton to be added.

      • addNetJoystick

        public static void addNetJoystick(NetJoystick j)
        Adds a NetJoystick to the update list.
        Parameters:
        j - The NetButton to be added.
